page.title: 10Braydon
page.content: It was only recently that 2 signposts were erected to direct motorists to Braydon. One signpost is on the B4040 Cricklade to Minety road. At this point Braydon is 2.5 miles away. The second signpost is on the Wooton Bassett to Brinkworth road. Braydon is an extensive sprawling region in the area of the remains of the ancient Bradon Forest. A parish meeting is held annually. Braydon is in the Ecclesiastical parish of Purton, so people from Braydon are buried in Purton. The land is mostly farmland and the Foresty Commision retains an interest in the area.
